skins.name: Cantarella
skins.description:
The dress worn by Cantarella the Bane is awash in flowing, vibrant colors.
These iridescent hues change and refract, shifting with the light, like a deadly creature lurking deep in the ocean, beautiful, dangerous, and hypnotic.

tags.name: Havoc DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Havoc DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

tags.name: Resonance Skill DMG Amplification
tags.description: Provides Resonance Skill DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

181.name: Embrace the Endless Waves
181.description: Casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> recovers <SapTag=0>{0}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=point P=points SapTag=0} of Trance. The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Graceful Step</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Flickering Reverie</color>, and Forte Circuit <color=Highlight>Perception Drain</color> is increased by {1}. Immune to interruptions while casting <color=Highlight>Perception Drain</color>.

182.name: Surrender to the Illusive Reverie
182.description: Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color> now sends the target into <color=Highlight><te href=850055>Hazy Dream</te></color>. The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Jolt</color> triggered by Cantarella is increased by {0}.

183.name: Gaze into the Abyss
183.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color> is increased by {0}. After casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color>, enter into <color=Highlight><te href=850054>Mirage</te></color>. If already in <color=Highlight><te href=850054>Mirage</te></color>, casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color> does not activate the Mirage state again.

184.name: Behold Your Own Soul
184.description: When in <color=Highlight><te href=850054>Mirage</te></color>, Healing Bonus is increased by {0}.

185.name: Rest in Your Reflection
185.description: The maximum number of <color=Highlight>Dreamweavers</color> Cantarella can summon through Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Diffusion</color> is increased by {0}.

186.name: Fall, Fall... and Fall Deeper into the Dream
186.description:
Increase the DMG Multiplier of Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color> by {0}. Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color> makes Cantarella's DMG ignore {1} of the target's DEF for {2}s.
For the first 1.2s of <color=Highlight><te href=850055>Hazy Dream</te></color>, when the target takes an instance of DMG that does not inflict <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color>, <color=Highlight>Jolt</color> will not be triggered on the target.

params.name: Illusion Collapse
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack - Delusive Dive</color></size>
When Cantarella has Trance, <color=Highlight>Heavy Attack</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Delusive Dive</color>, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> to the target, and then Cantarella enters <color=Highlight><te href=850054>Mirage</te></color>. While in <color=Highlight>Mirage</color>, casting <color=Highlight>Delusive Dive</color> does not activate <color=Highlight>Mirage</color> again.
Can be cast in water.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> right after a successful <color=Highlight>Dodge</color> to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.

params.name: Dance with Shadows
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Graceful Step</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Flickering Reverie</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight><te href=850054>Mirage</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Flickering Reverie</color>, which is considered an <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color> when being cast. Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, and send them into <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Hazy Dream</color></size>
Reduce the target's movement speed for {0}s. When the target takes damage, <color=Highlight>Jolt</color> is triggered once, removing <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color> to deal <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
Attacks by other Resonators in the team will not <color=Highlight>Jolt</color> a target influenced by <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color> and will remove the <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color>. 
Coordinated Attacks and damage from Utilities will not <color=Highlight>Jolt</color> a target.

params.name: Beneath the Sea
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Flowing Suffocation</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> (considered Basic Attack DMG). Grant <color=Highlight>Diffusion</color> to all Resonators in the team. Casting this skill is also considered as casting <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Diffusion</color></size>
When the Resonator on the field deals damage to a target, summon <color=Highlight>Dreamweavers</color> to perform Coordinated Attack, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color> (considered as Basic Attack DMG).
- Within {0}s after the Resonator deals damage, summon <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> <color=Highlight>{Cus:Sap,S=Dreamweaver P=Dreamweavers SapTag=1}</color> per second. This effect can be triggered once per second. Damage dealt by <color=Highlight>Dreamweavers</color> cannot trigger this effect.
- Up to <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> <color=Highlight>{Cus:Sap,S=Dreamweaver P=Dreamweavers SapTag=2}</color> can be summoned each second, max {3} <color=Highlight>Dreamweavers</color> in total.
- This effect lasts for {4}s or until reaching the maximum number of <color=Highlight>Dreamweavers</color>.

params.name: "Poison"
params.description: Casting <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color> gives {0} Havoc DMG Bonus for {1}s, stacking up to {2} times.

params.name: Cruise
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Ripple</color></size>
Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> shortly after casting this skill to start the Basic Attack combo from <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Tidal Surge</color></size>
When in <color=Highlight>Mirage</color>, <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Tidal Surge</color>, which triggers 3 coordinated attacks on hit, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. Casting <color=Highlight>Tidal Surge</color> resets the combo of Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color>.

params.name: Between Illusion and Reality
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Mirage</color></size>
- <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> becomes Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color>. Perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. Can be cast in mid-air. When cast mid-air, Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color> consumes STA, and the combo does not reset when Cantarella is airborne.
- Hitting the target with Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color> consumes {0} point of Trance to obtain {1} point of Shiver and heal all nearby Resonators in the team.
- The third stage of Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color> triggers 3 Coordinated Attacks, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Abysmal Vortex</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Jump</color> to perform a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>.
- <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> becomes Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Shadowy Sweep</color>. Attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>. {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> right after casting the skill to cast Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting Stage 2</color>.
- When Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Abysmal Vortex</color> or Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Shadowy Sweep</color> hits a target, consume {0} point of Trance to obtain {1} point of Shiver and heal all nearby Resonators in the team.
- Mirage lasts for {2}s.
- <color=Highlight>Mirage</color> ends when Trance is depleted.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Forte Circuit - Perception Drain</color></size>
If Cantarella has {3} points of Shiver when in <color=Highlight>Mirage</color>, <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> becomes <color=Highlight>Perception Drain</color>.
Consume all Shiver to attack the target, dealing <color=Dark>Havoc DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG. Send the target into <color=Highlight>Hazy Dream</color> and heal all Resonators in the team.
Casting this skill is also considered as casting <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color>.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Abyssal Rebirth</color></size>
After casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color>, Cantarella enters <color=Highlight>Abyssal Rebirth</color>, which lasts for {5}s and can be activated once every 25s. In the duration, for up to 6 times, when Resonators in the team cast <color=Highlight>Echo Skill</color>, Cantarella recovers {4} points of Concerto Energy. Echoes with the same name can only trigger this effect once.
When in water, Cantarella's swimming speed increases and STA cost decreases.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Trance</color></size>
- Cantarella can hold up to {6} points of Trance.
- Casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill</color> recovers {7} point of Trance.
- Hitting a target with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color> recovers {8} point of Trance.
- Casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Graceful Step</color> recovers {9} point of Trance.
- Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Flowing Suffocation</color> recovers {10} points of Trance.
- When in the water, recover {12} point of Trance every {11}s.
<size=10> </size>
<size=40><color=Title>Shiver</color></size>
- Cantarella can hold up to {13} points of Shiver.
- Hitting the target with Basic Attack <color=Highlight>Phantom Sting</color> recovers {14} point of Shiver.
- When Mid-air Attack <color=Highlight>Abysmal Vortex</color> or Dodge Counter <color=Highlight>Shadowy Sweep</color> hits a target, restore {15} point of Shiver.

params.name: Gentle Tentacles
params.description: Amplify the incoming Resonator's Havoc DMG by {0} and Resonance Skill DMG by {1} for {2}s. Switching Resonators ends this effect.

params.name: Tune Break: Rectifier
params.description: When the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, the Resonator may cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
